Package net.firstpartners.core.drools

Class RuleRunnerFactory

java.lang.Object
net.firstpartners.core.drools.RuleRunnerFactory
public class RuleRunnerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Return an instance of RuleRunner, Appropriately configured with the various IDocumentStrategy etc to handle the current document request
Author:
PBrowne

    • getRuleRunner

      public static RuleRunner getRuleRunner​(java.lang.String inputFileName, java.lang.String ruleSourceAsString, java.lang.String outputFileName) throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
      Convenience constructor, state rules as single string
      Parameters:
      inputFileName - - where we get the data from
      ruleSourceAsString - - name of a single rule file
      outputFileName - - where we will output the file to
      Returns:
      RuleRunner Object with the correct input / output Strategies configured
      Throws:
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.InstantiationException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.SecurityException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • getRuleRunner

      public static RuleRunner getRuleRunner​(java.lang.String inputFileName, RuleConfig ruleSource, java.lang.String outputFileName) throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
      Create a properly configured RuleRunner for the Input / Output file types we are passing
      Parameters:
      inputFileName - - where we get the data from
      ruleSourceAsString - - name of a multiple rule files
      outputFileName - - where we will output the file to
      Returns:
      RuleRunner Object with the correct input / output Strategies configured
      Throws:
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.InstantiationException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - - from underlying input - output libs
      java.lang.SecurityException
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
